overview: "1422" is basically a symbolic representation on the context of the incident of women harassment in the TSC area of ​​Dhaka University on April 14th,2015. The injustice with women is highlighted here. After committing such a heinous crime not even a single culprit has been brought to justice till date and justice has been repeatedly delayed. If this situation continues in the coming days there will be a lack of trust in the country and eventually our society will go through an unrest situation and also our law enforcement agencies will become a questionable element.
